title: AI-powered wearable boosts preventative care for elderly

title: Google Buys Data Center Company for $4.75 Billion
description: The deal for Intersect, a data center and energy developer, is set to help Google built out its infrastructure for artificial intelligence.
content:

title: AI could help predict nutrition risks in ICU patients
description: A new study by researchers at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai suggests that artificial intelligence (AI) could help predict which critically ill patients on ventilators are at risk of underfeeding, potentially enabling clinicians to adjust nutrition early and improve patient care. Details of the study were published in the December 17 online issue of Nature Communications.
